a0.speaker: Jane:
a0.dialogue: Are you getting away with your goal to ruin this concert? Listen up, traitor.

a1.speaker: Jane:
a1.dialogue: There's one way for me to not call you a traitor: Accept my new offer to join me!

a2.speaker: Sakuya:
a2.dialogue: Traitor? I haven't done anything for you!

a3.speaker: Sakuya:
a3.dialogue: If you insist on making me join your concert, you are not gonna like what will come next.

a4.speaker: Sakuya:
a4.dialogue: I heard you have a 'master', right? After I deal with you for real, I am gonna show them who's the real boss here!
